summary: RECEIVED MULTIPLE RECALL NOTICES FROM CHRYLSER IN THE COURSE OF LAST ~1.5 YR. WHEN I CALL TO SCHEDULE WITH LOCAL DEALER IN KOKOMO IN THEY TAKE MY INFO & SAY THEY'LL CALL WHEN PARTS COME AVAILABLE.  OVER A YEAR LATER AND I 'M GETTING PAPERWORK ON TK HOLDINGS  (TAKATA) CHAPTER 11 FILING.   JUST WANT CHRYSLER TO REPLACE THE AIRBAG.. HELP !
